This method checks whether or not a remis can be claimed by the current player.

This method checks for all game-ending criteria and notifies the corresponding methods of your GUIController if necessary.

This enum consists of the two colors black and white.

choosePromotion() - Method in interface graphic.GUIController
This method will be called by the Gamelogic, if a pawn reaches the other side of the board and gets a promotion.

Triggering this method will delete all data of the current chess-game.
